title: Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help
tags: ask the goblin priestess for help
content:
talk privately? This is a sensitive matter. Leave.

Taking Guts offer to help you will end the dialogue and she will take you into the Chapel. You will have to leave your companions and enter the Chapel alone. Speak to her when you've entered alone. She will ask if you are ready, this will give you the following dialogue options.

Yes. I'm ready. What exactly are you going to do? Change of plan. I'm going to kill you. Leave.
